did.unittitle: ILR School Faculty Committee on Personnel Policies Files, 1956- 1962

origination.label: Creator:

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Files of the ILR School's Faculty Committee on Personnel Policies.

scopecontent.p: This collection contains correspondence, memoranda, notes, and reports relating to the work of the ILR School's Faculty Committee on Personnel Policies, 1956-1962.

controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations.
